text.section: Before an organization may conduct a gaming event, the organization shall obtain a permit from the county commissioners.

section.section:
The permit shall state:
the nature of any gaming device to be operated at the gaming event; and
the frequency with which the gaming event will be conducted.
The county commissioners may charge a reasonable fee for a permit.
